review: Fire was probably the easiest thing I have ever installed.  You plug in a USB cable, plug in the box and start watching movies.  It was pre-programmed with my Prime info so no setup was necessary.  Love it!
author: CountryGirl

review: Sounds like a great idea.  All this power, all those channels, and so much more, but no HBO GO?  Ever heard of a little show called Game of Thrones?  What about True Blood?  The Sopranos?  True Detective?  All these shows and more available for streaming at the touch of a button, on demand, at any time on any day.  What would a Saturday binge watch be without that option?  The one thing Fire is lacking is the one thing I and so many others find ourselves watching the most.  Until you're able to ink some kind of a deal with HBO, Amazon, I'll stick with my Roku.
author: R. Jordan
